name: ROCKROCKET v1.0
description:
Rockrocket is a small exploration platformer.
You have to unveil the secrets of the cave and finally escape through the opening.

//CONTROLS
- Left/Right: Arrow keys
- Jump: Z
- Action: X
- Exit: Escape
- Toggle Fullscreen: Alt+Enter

//INFO
My very first game - made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31 - Theme: Entire Game on One Screen

Made with Gamemaker studio,some Moog and love.
Concept/design/programming : Backterria
Audio: Slower
